text: The University of Lyon is a group of institutions for higher education and research in the cities of Lyon and Saint-Étienne in France. It is the largest French center for higher education outside of Paris, with 25 associated institutions and 120,000 students. == Other websites == * Official website Université de Lyon == References == Category:Colleges and universities in France Category:Organizations based in Lyon Category:Saint-Étienne
title: University of Lyon
